annotations.description: The very first words we ever hear Teddy speak on Bob's Burgers describe this Swanky Panky cocktail: turns out it's awesome! *********************************...
annotations.title: The Swanky Panky from Bob's Burgers | How to Drink

textContent:
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Antica Sweet Vermouth
1 oz. -or- 30 Ml. Aviation Gin
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Rittenhouse Rye
2 dashes Fernet Branca

Stir over ice
Serve in coupe
Garnish with orange twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zT9iqeENJB0
title: Swanky Panky
